title.en: A Daily Prayer to Gesar, King of the Dralas

text.en: We invoke you, we present offerings to you, Great Lion Norbu Dradül, embodiment of all Three Roots,
text.en-trans: sol lo chö do tsa sum kündü sengchen norbu dradul

text.en: Great drala for all living beings, together with your consort, heirs and retinue,
text.en-trans: kyebu yong kyi dralha chenpo yabyum sé khor dang chepa nam dang

text.en: And the thirty warrior kinsmen, including Puwo Bumpa and Gyatsa Shalkar,
text.en-trans: puwo bumpa zhal kar lasok pu nu sumchu

text.en: The eighteen maidens, such as the glorious queen of ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: palden daki tsomo sok dangmen chobgyé

text.en: The armies of devas, nāgas, andnyen,
The allied forces of dralas and wermas,

Together with their aides and the arrogant spirits of appearance and existence—to you all, I present vast offerings, both real and imagined, including the select portion of samaya substances. I praise you! I exalt you!
text.en-trans: kadö nangsi drekpa dang chepa khyé nam la damdzé pü kyi chöpa sok ngöjor yitrul gyi chöpa gyachenpö chö do tö do ngasol lo

text.en: From now until reach the essence of awakening, be a patron deity and warrior spirit to this practitioner!
text.en-trans: dü di né changchub nyingpö bardu naljorpa dak gi polha dang dralha dzö chik

text.en: Be a refuge and protector, a supportive force!
text.en-trans: gön kyab dang pungdrok dzö chik

text.en: Guard against all sickness, obstructing forces, obstacles and disharmony!
text.en-trans: nedön barché mitünpé chok kün lé sungwa dang

text.en: Expand and increase ever further my lifespan, merit, resources, influence, fame, charisma, confidence, and progeny—all the objects of my desire!
text.en-trans: tsé sö paljor ngatang nyendrak ziji pobpa rik gyü lasokpa döpé dön tamché gong né gong du pel zhing gyepa dang

text.en: Bring whomsoever we wish, including deities, demons and human beings, under our control!
text.en-trans: lha dré mi sum lasok gang sam wang du duwa dang

text.en: Annihilate all malevolent and malicious enemies and obstacle-makers! Swiftly bring us the qualities of the paths and stages and cause us to attain unsurpassable awakening!
text.en-trans: nöjé samjor ngenpé dragek tamché tsarchöpa dang sa dang lam gyi yönten nyurdu dzok té lanamepé changchub tobpa dang

text.en: Bring us all the physical strength of the oceans of dralas and wermas, and grant us all the siddhis of perfect victory over all!
text.en-trans: drala werma gyatsö ku shuk dak la zhuk né chok tadak lé nampar gyalwé ngödrub malüpa tsolwar dzö chik
